title: $650 Renovated Studio Apt. with Water Included and On-site Laundry
posting_body: Please contact us by text at
if you would like to schedule a tour or have any questions.
We have immediate move-in availability on a 300 ft² newly renovated studio with fresh paint, upgraded kitchen, and bath.

Thoughtfully designed with comfort in mind, our floor plans feature a wide array of stylishly efficient amenities including an open kitchen, all-electric kitchen, refrigerator, pantry, tile flooring, ceiling fans, mini blinds, window air conditioning, and more.
We bring you classic apartments living at their best.
